aid.name: Aid
aid.text: Ready this die. You may spend it to add +1 to an allyâ€™s check.

draw.name: Draw
draw.text: Draw or stow up to two pieces of ready gear, or draw one piece of nearby gear.

dash.name: Dash
dash.text: Move a short distance {in addition to the free move at the start of the Act).

hastyaction.name: Hasty Action
hastyaction.text: Perform an open action {ds:91). If it requires a check, it is hasty.

lightstrike.name: Light Strike
lightstrike.text: Make a hasty {attack} with a non-heavy weapon {ds:96).

recover.name: Recover
recover.text: Gain +2 footing. +1 if not adjacent to an enemy, +1/2 with useful/perfect trait.

standardstrike.name: Standard Strike
standardstrike.text: Make an {attack} as discussed on page 96 of the Doomsong corebook.

standardaction.name: Standard Action
standardaction.text: Perform an open action {ds:91). If it requires a check, it is standard.

heavystrike.name: Heavy Strike
heavystrike.text: Make a focused {attack} with a non-light weapon {ds:96).

setup.name: Set Up
setup.text: Ready this die and state a trigger. If met, spend to take a free {Act 4} action.

focusedaction.name: Focused Action
focusedaction.text: Perform an open action. If it requires a check, it is focused.

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.text: Ready this die. Spend it to make a focused {retreat} in the next phase {ds:101).
